item.title: Pro Android Studio - Refactoring

item.description: My previous blog post described how to set up your own private Maven repository with Artifactory in 30 minutes. This second and final part will make things more interesting and take your setup to the next level.

item.title: A private Maven repository for Android in 30 min
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: Setting up your own Maven repository and uploading artifacts to it is quite a daunting task. As I went through this experience myself recently, I want to help others in setting up their own Maven repository via Artifactory and automate uploading artifacts using Gradle.
